metadata.title: CVE-2023-52593 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:wifi: wfx: fix possible NULL pointer dereference in wfx_set_mfp_ap()Since 'ieee80211_beacon_get()' can return NULL, 'wfx_set_mfp_ap()'should check the return value before examining skb data. So convertthe latter to return an appropriate error code and propagate it toreturn from 'wfx_start_ap()' as well. Compile tested only.

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
